sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0420 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_RTO , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_SUM , USALY_AMNT_YN , EMYMT_DIV_CD , CMPTTN_STD_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payYr# , #typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , #payrItemSeilNum# , #occuClssPayCmpttnStd# , #payArithExprCalcDivCd# , #arithExprCmpttnPymtItemCd# , #arithExprCmpttnRto# , #arithExprCmpttnSum# , #usalyAmntYn# , #emymtDivCd# , #cmpttnStdNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0420 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PAY_YR=#payYr# , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum# , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd# , PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD=#payArithExprCalcDivCd# , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD=#arithExprCmpttnPymtItemCd# , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_RTO=#arithExprCmpttnRto# , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_SUM=#arithExprCmpttnSum# , USALY_AMNT_YN=#usalyAmntYn# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , CMPTTN_STD_NOTE_CTNT=#cmpttnStdNoteCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum# AND OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0420 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum# AND OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_RTO , ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_SUM , USALY_AMNT_YN , EMYMT_DIV_CD , CMPTTN_STD_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0420 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum# AND OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM FROM PAYR0420 AA, PAYR0400 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')=#pyspGrdeCd#
AND BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
BB.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.PAY_YR DESC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM FROM PAYR0420 AA, PAYR0400 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')=#pyspGrdeCd#
AND BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
BB.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , (CC.PAYR_IMCD) AS PAY_ITEM_CD , CC.ITEM_NM , CC.PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD) AS PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_NM , AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD) AS ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_NM , AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_RTO , AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_SUM , AA.USALY_AMNT_YN , AA.CMPTTN_STD_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0420 AA, PAYR0400 BB , PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM = CC.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
CC.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')=#pyspGrdeCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.PAY_YR DESC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM ASC , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , (CC.PAYR_IMCD) AS PAY_ITEM_CD , CC.ITEM_NM , CC.PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_CD) AS PAY_ARITH_EXPR_CALC_DIV_NM , AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_CD) AS ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_PYMT_ITEM_NM , AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_RTO , AA.ARITH_EXPR_CMPTTN_SUM , AA.USALY_AMNT_YN , AA.CMPTTN_STD_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0420 AA, PAYR0400 BB , PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM = CC.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
CC.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000')=#pyspGrdeCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , (OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD) AS OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD_DISP FROM PAYR0420 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , PAY_YR DESC , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD FROM PAYR0420 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
)
